DOC.brief_summary: This prospective study compares the use of indirect pulp therapy and mineral trioxide aggregate pulpotomy for pulp therapy of the primary molar with dental caries approaching the pulp.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Comparison of Indirect Pulp Therapy and Mineral Trioxide Aggregate Pulpotomy in Decayed Primary Molars
DOC.criteria: Child with at least one primary molar with deep decay approaching the pulp.
